page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: We interviewed Anna Beardshaw on "Life Styles". She is l4 years old and lives near Cold Harbour Farm in Wickham. She has a brother, one dog and two cats. She goes to Wykeham House School in Fareham. Anna gets up at 7.30 a.m. on school days, 8.30 on Saturdays (because of tennis) and 9.30 a.m. on Sundays. On school days Anna goes to bed at l0.30 p.m. Other days she goes to bed at midnight. She has breakfast every morning and eats her evening meal at 6.30 p.m. In yhe evenings she watches television, plays tennis, does her homework or goes swimming, and at the weekends she may go to a disco or a party. Anna finds that there is not really at lot to do in her area in the evening.
